subject: Economy
topic: Yojana Aayog se NITI Aayog tak ka Parivartan
question_en: What is the role of NITI Aayog in the development of Indian economy?
question_hi: नेतृत्व क्षेत्र का निवेदन प्रवेश आवश्यक है।
A_en: NITI Aayog focuses on formulating policies for socio-economic development.
